title: Fan, 1770
medium:
Medium: paper, ivory, glass
Technique: painted paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robertson D. Ward, from the collection of her mother, Mrs. Helen Wright-Clark Dawson
description: Pleated fan. Front and back leaves of painted parchment showing Italian pastoral scenes. Sticks of carved and pierced ivory; glass stone at the rivet

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, 1770.
1770. Medium: paper, ivory, glass
Technique: painted paper. Gift of Mrs. Robertson D. Ward, from the collection of her mother, Mrs. Helen Wright-Clark Dawson. 1970-58-19.
